get.summary: Returns a paginated list of deployments.

parameters.name: expandMetadata
parameters.description: Retrieves the 'metadata' field of the resource.

parameters.name: expandProject
parameters.description: The 'project' field of each resulting deployment will be retrieved.

parameters.name: expandResources
parameters.description: The 'resources' field of each resulting deployment will be retrieved.

parameters.name: forceCachedResources
parameters.description: The 'resources' field of each deployment in the result list will be read from a cache for a faster query.

parameters.name: forceRefreshResources
parameters.description: The 'resources' field of each deployment in the result list will be guaranteed up-to-date.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A comma-separated list. Only deployments with these IDs will be included in the results.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Results must have exactly this name.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: projects
parameters.description: A comma-separated list. Results must be associated with one of these project IDs.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Results must either have names with this string as a prefix or contain this string in their description.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: templates
parameters.description: A comma-separated list. Results must be associated with one of these templates.

get.summary: Returns true if a deployment with the supplied name exists.
Returns the deployment with the supplied ID.

parameters.name: expandMetadata
parameters.description: Retrieves the 'metadata' field of the resource.

parameters.name: expandProject
parameters.description: The 'project' field of the deployment will be retrieved.

parameters.name: expandResources
parameters.description: The 'resources' field of the deployment will be retrieved.

parameters.name: forceCachedResources
parameters.description: The 'resources' field of the deployment will be guaranteed up-to-date.

parameters.name: forceRefreshResources
parameters.description: The 'resources' field of the deployment will be read from a cache for a faster query.

delete.summary: Deletes the deployment with the supplied ID.

patch.summary: Updates the deployment with the supplied ID.

parameters.name: update
parameters.description: A set of fields to overwrite the corresponding fields in the deployment

get.summary: Returns the complete list of available operations that can be performed on a given deployment.
Returns a ResourceOperation for the deployment specified by its id.

post.summary: Submit a deployment resource action request

get.summary: Returns a paginated list of resources corresponding to the deployment with the supplied ID.

parameters.name: expandMetadata
parameters.description: Retrieves the 'metadata' field of each resource.

parameters.name: forceCachedResources
parameters.description: Retrieves the resources from a cache for a faster query.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Returns the resource with the specified ID that is correlated with the supplied deployment.

parameters.name: expandMetadata
parameters.description: Retrieves the 'metadata' field of the resource.

parameters.name: forceCachedResources
parameters.description: Retrieves the resource from a cache for a faster query.

delete.summary: Deletes the resource with the specified ID that is correlated with the supplied deployment.

get.summary: Returns the complete list of available operations that can be performed on a given resource.
Returns a ResourceOperation for the resource specified by its id.
Returns a count of deployments using the project.
Get all requests for a deployment

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Get request for the specified ID

inputs.description: The inputs that were used to request this deployment

resources.description: Expanded resources for the deployment. Content of this property will not be maintained backward compatible

Deployment.title: Deployment
Deployment.description: A group of resources such as machines, network, software, etc... typically provisioned together to deliver a complete/workable application.

completedTasks.description: The number of tasks completed while fulfilling this request.

deploymentId.description: Deployment id to which the request applies to

name.description: User friendly name of the request (e.g. 'shutdown myVM')

resourceId.description: Optional resource id to which the request applies to (e.g. day 2 operation target)

statusDetails.description: Additional user-friendly details regarding the current status.

totalTasks.description: The total number of tasks need to be completed to fulfil this request.

DeploymentRequest.title: DeploymentRequest
DeploymentRequest.description: To track the current status of Day2 actions on either deployments or resources

additionalExpense.description: Additional expense incurred for the resource.

expenseSyncCode.description: Expense sync message code if any.

dependsOn.description: A list of other resources this resource depends on

Resource.title: Resource
Resource.description: A resource part of a deployment.

valid.description: Resource action is valid for current state

actionId.description: The id of the action to perform.

reason.description: Reason for requesting a day2 operation
